expenses.title: My Expenses
expenses.pageDescription: Manage all your expenses in one place
expenses.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? This action cannot be undone.
expenses.addConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to add this expense?
expenses.editConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to save these changes?

chat.title: Quick Add
chat.description: Add expenses quickly using conversational AI
chat.inputPlaceholder: Type a message or describe an expense...
chat.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm your expense assistant. You can tell me about your expenses, and I'll help you log them. Try saying something like "I spent $50 on groceries today"
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

mockResponses.response1: Got it! I've recorded your expense of $50 on groceries. Would you like to add any more details?
mockResponses.response2: Thanks for sharing! I've added a $25 lunch expense to your records. Anything else?
mockResponses.response3: Perfect! Your coffee expense of $5 has been logged. Need to add more?
mockResponses.response4: I've recorded your transportation cost of $15. Would you like to categorize it further?
mockResponses.response5: Great! Your entertainment expense of $40 has been added. What else can I help you with?

chat.voiceResponse: I've recorded your dinner expense of $30. Would you like to specify which restaurant?
chat.fileResponse: I can see your receipt! It looks like a $45 expense at a restaurant. Should I add this to your records?
